text: عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَجْعَلَ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَ ٱلَّذِينَ عَادَيْتُم مِّنْهُم مَّوَدَّةً ۚ وَٱللَّهُ قَدِيرٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: Perhaps Allah will put, between you and those to whom you have been enemies among them, affection. And Allah is competent, and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
translation.id.indonesian: Mudah-mudahan Allah menimbulkan kasih sayang antaramu dengan orang-orang yang kamu musuhi di antara mereka. Dan Allah adalah Maha Kuasa. Dan Allah Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang.
